keyMappings:
# Insert your preferred key mappings here.

map Y previousTab
map E nextTab

map e scrollDown
map y scrollUp

map q removeTab

map ' Marks.activateGotoMode

map % LinkHints.activateModeToOpenInNewForegroundTab
map $ copyCurrentUrl

map D duplicateTab

map a visitPreviousTab

map < moveTabLeft
map > moveTabRight

unmap <c-e>
searchEngines:
w: https://www.wikipedia.org/w/index.php?title=Special:Search&search=%s Wikipedia
y: https://www.youtube.com/results?search_query=%s Youtube
g: https://github.com/search?q=%s&type=repositories Github
l: https://www.google.com/search?q=%s&btnI I'm feeling lucky...
ei: https://translate.google.com/?sl=en&tl=it&text=%s&op=translate English to Italian
ie: https://translate.google.com/?sl=it&tl=en&text=%s&op=translate Italian to English
ec: https://translate.google.com/?sl=en&tl=zh-CN&text=%s&op=translate English to Chinese
ce: https://translate.google.com/?sl=zh-CN&tl=en&text=%s&op=translate Chinese to English

# gm: https://www.google.com/maps?q=%s Google maps
# b: https://www.bing.com/search?q=%s Bing
